text: Mwaziririjwe (kurya) icyipfushije, amaraso, inyama y’ingurube, icyabagiwe ikitari Allah, ikishwe kinizwe, ikishwe gikubiswe, icyapfuye gihanutse, icyapfuye gitewe ihembe n’ikindi, n’icyariweho n’inyamaswa (kigapfa) uretse icyo mwabashije kubaga kitarapfa), ndetse n’icyabagiwe ibigirwamana. (Mwaziririjwe kandi) kuraguza (mushaka kumenya ibizababaho); ibyo byose kuri mwe ni ukwigomeka ku mategeko ya Allah. Kuri ubu, ba bandi bahakanye bataye icyizere (cy’uko mutakivuye) mu idini ryanyu, bityo ntimukabatinye, ahubwo abe ari njye mutinya. Uyu munsi mbuzurije idini ryanyu, kandi mbasenderejeho inema zanjye, nanabahitiyemo ko Isilamu iba idini ryanyu.
